name: Prana Reylian Top - Women's
description: Burn through your HIIT session or settle deep into pigeon pose. Whether you're working up a sweat or focusing on your breath, the Reylian Top keeps you cool and comfortable. A wide shirttail hem and 4-way stretch fabric let you move freely through your workout.Made of super-soft Modal and spandex for breathability and unrestricted motion.High neck provides a little extra coverage.Back slit keeps you cool and adds a bit of flair.
